name: The Lazy Comedy
description:
The Lazy comedy is a game made for Godot Wild Jam #45, with the theme "Underground" and its Wildcards:

-Breathtaking: "Include a scenic view"

-Next: "Have your character change visually after death"

-Deal with the devil: "Make a trade that you'll regret"

At the beginning of the game, in front of a beautiful scenario you will find the contract that you have to sign with the devil and during the game you will see how death changes sinners like you.

I have based the game on "The Divine Comedy" by Dante Alighieri, written in the 14th century, where he recounts his descent through the circles of hell and encounters the punishments of each sin in each level of hell.

I have based some levels on these tortures and punishments, I hope you like it and enjoy it.

Everything used in the game is made by me, from all the sprites and animations to the sounds and music, even the color palette.

*(I have included the level selection button for the most cowardly. I have already taken into account the difficulty for everyone to complete the game ¬¬)

Thanks for playing it and repent, sinners.

-- Endorth --
